short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-in helps manage multi-language support during column/field creation in PowerApps and Dynamics 365.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage multi-language fields effortlessly in PowerApps and Dynamics 365 with this powerful add-in. Select your additional languages, and input fields for the labels will automatically appear when creating fields in the PowerApps Maker Portal, streamlining the localization process directly within your workflow.
